directions: Slice the orange, lemon, and lime into thin rounds.  Place the citrus in a pitcher with the apples, cherries, and pineapple.  Pour in the brandy and refrigerate for 2 hours of more.  Chill the bottle of red wine, lemon-lime soda, and orange juice at the same time.
Gently crush the fruits with a spoon, then stir in the red wine, lemon-lime soda, and orange juice.  Add additional brandy or orange juice to taste.
ingredients: 1 medium all purpose apples, pared, cored and sliced
1 (12 ounce) can lemon-lime soda to taste
title: Sangria by the Pros
